IcecladMod:FrozenHeart.NAME: Frozen Heart
IcecladMod:FrozenHeart.FLAVOR: Much better than owning a boiling heart.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first attack of your turn applies icecladmod:Icicle for the amount of damage dealt.

IcecladMod:PlaceholderRelic2.NAME: Placeholder Relic 2
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b1 #yStrength.

IcecladMod:DefaultClickableRelic.NAME: Right-Clicky Relic
IcecladMod:DefaultClickableRelic.FLAVOR: The more you right-click it, the more orbs you've evoked in your lifetime.
